_header: Unto you most forward this letter I write
Subjects: love letters; satires; women, as speakers/narrators; dialogues, lovers’
_description: A satirical love letter written by a mistress to her lover — five stanzas rhyme royal

BodRawPoe36.First Lines:
Vnto you most froward þis letre I writeWhych hath causyd me so
                    longe in dyspayre…
BodRawPoe36.Last Lines:
…That hath ij good eyen & I chese here suche a makeOr onys
                    wold lyst vp here for youre sake
BodRawPoe36.Note:
On f. 3v: ‘To my trew loue and Able / As the wedyr cok
                    he is stable / Thys letter to hym bedelueryd’.
